payload.content: Moltbook's distribution strategy involves immediately installing a HEARTBEAT.md file that leverages OpenClaw's built-in heartbeating feature to power agents filling Moltbook.

name: Moltbook's distribution strategy involves immediately installing a HEARTBEAT.md
content: Moltbook's distribution strategy involves immediately installing a HEARTBEAT.md file that leverages OpenClaw's built-in heartbeating feature to power agents filling Moltbook.

payload.content: To install Moltbook, users send their agent a message with a link to `https://www.moltbook.com/skill.md`, which contains installation instructions including curl commands to set up skill, heartbeat, messaging, and package files locally.

name: To install Moltbook, users send their agent a message with a link to `https://ww
content: To install Moltbook, users send their agent a message with a link to `https://www.moltbook.com/skill.md`, which contains installation instructions including curl commands to set up skill, heartbeat, messaging, and package files locally.

payload.content: Cursor's approach to self-driving codebases involves a central Planner agent that commands workers and can spin up other planners to achieve high throughput, such as ~1000 commits per hour.

name: Cursor's approach to self-driving codebases involves a central Planner agent tha
content: Cursor's approach to self-driving codebases involves a central Planner agent that commands workers and can spin up other planners to achieve high throughput, such as ~1000 commits per hour.

payload.content: OpenAI Frontier centralizes the management layer for large numbers of high-volume agents within a dashboard that allows drilling down to individual agent instances.

name: OpenAI Frontier centralizes the management layer for large numbers of high-volum
content: OpenAI Frontier centralizes the management layer for large numbers of high-volume agents within a dashboard that allows drilling down to individual agent instances.

payload.content: The only two ways to make money in software are by bundling it and unbundling it.

name: The only two ways to make money in software are by bundling it and unbundling it
content: The only two ways to make money in software are by bundling it and unbundling it.

payload.content: A massive AI-enabled bundling of all software is currently occurring, likely at a larger magnitude than the hardware bundling seen with smartphones.

name: A massive AI-enabled bundling of all software is currently occurring, likely at
content: A massive AI-enabled bundling of all software is currently occurring, likely at a larger magnitude than the hardware bundling seen with smartphones.

payload.content: Attempts to build SuperApps have consistently failed outside of China.

name: Attempts to build SuperApps have consistently failed outside of China.
content: Attempts to build SuperApps have consistently failed outside of China.

payload.content: ChatGPT and Claude Cowork are on their way to becoming AI "Superapps".

name: ChatGPT and Claude Cowork are on their way to becoming AI "Superapps".
content: ChatGPT and Claude Cowork are on their way to becoming AI "Superapps".

payload.content: Eventually, apps will share tokens to avoid users paying for many $20/month subscriptions, though this is not expected soon according to Sam Altman.

name: Eventually, apps will share tokens to avoid users paying for many $20/month subs
content: Eventually, apps will share tokens to avoid users paying for many $20/month subscriptions, though this is not expected soon according to Sam Altman.
